record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 5515
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 5515 -- (House of Representatives - April 22, 2008)

[Page: H2538]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to withdraw my name as a cosponsor of H.R. 5515.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Virginia?
